channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flickering Street Lamp, 30th December
item.description:
Street light has been flickering since it turned on. Its causing our children not to be able to sleep due to the flickering light constantly coming through our bedroom curtains
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82, White Horse Hill, Coldharbour, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle abandoned on close, 30th December
item.description:
The abandoned vehicle is located on Brasted Close, near the electric services box. The vehicle has been left in the same position for approximately a year and has not moved during that time. All tyres are flat, and the vehicle is in a poor, unmaintained condition. It is also obstructing the right-of-way onto the path adjoining building, causing an access issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peak Hill Gardens, Forest Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At least 5 street lights out at the junction, including at crossings, 30th December
item.description:
At least 5 street lights are out around the junction and crossings making it hard to see where you are walking and driving. Saw someone nearly get hit by car as a result. Feels dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Euston Underpass, Fitzrovia, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: All out - three or more street lights in a row

item.title: Road not leveled, 30th December
item.description:

item.title: 126 Felixstowe Road: pile of litter and leaves., 30th December
item.description:
Second report. First report states: “Fixed.” However, litter and leaves still against wall as per photo. There is litter all down this road from 126 to 134. If it cannot be cleared, rather than mark report as “Fixed,” please explain why the fly-tipping cannot be removed. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Felixstowe Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping and misuse of shed for littering FixMyStreet ref: 8251053., 30th December
item.description:
I am reporting a problem that was fixed back in October with reference FixMyStreet ref: 8251053. Please can you make sure that the cleaners’ shed has a lock to avoid further littering in the same shed?? We have a serious problem with rats in The block!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Weymouth Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
